adjustments: S23 = P0 evidence lock + MCP spike (hosted-baseline backup/restore evidence green before broad MCP rollout)
Dashboard V2 moved behind infra hardening (S28)
x402 = optional adapter in S30, not core dependency
Fail-closed gates: each sprint has artifact + gate command + runbook

epics.Description: Close all P0 operations evidence with hosted-baseline backup/restore, then spike MCP server to prove the agent integration path.
Ship multi-language SDKs, CLI v2, developer portal, and interactive API explorer targeting <5min time-to-first-settlement.
Production MCP server, HTTP gateway, and framework adapters turning Settld into infrastructure for the agent ecosystem.
SOC 2 readiness, selective disclosure proofs, PII redaction, data residency, GDPR endpoints, and compliance dashboard.
Connection pooling, RLS, rate limiting, job queue, health checks, graceful shutdown, and secrets management for 10K settlements/min.
Structured logging, tracing, metrics v2, alerting, chaos engineering, incident automation, and live dashboard cutover on stable ops data.
Capability catalog, dynamic pricing, multi-party agreements, RFQ matching, marketplace analytics, and agent-to-agent delegation.
Multi-currency ledger, Stripe Connect, cross-border compliance, payout scheduling, financial reporting, and optional x402 adapter.
Org hierarchy, SSO, approval workflows, policy simulation sandbox, custom SLA builder, and enterprise audit workspace.
Multi-region PostgreSQL, CDN, read replicas, event streaming, DR runbook, and blue/green deployment for 99.99% uptime.
In-product upgrade prompts, referral program, usage-based billing v2, template marketplace, embeddable widget, CS automation, and status page.
Protocol v2 spec, third-party verifier certification, plugin SDK, cross-platform conformance, industry working group, and ecosystem directory.

tickets.Description: Validate and refresh hosted-baseline evidence in staging with real DB URL secrets; archive signed artifacts.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: hosted-baseline-staging.json status=pass with backupRestore.ok=true (or rerun confirms existing pass artifact)

tickets.Description: Validate and refresh hosted-baseline evidence in production with real DB URL secrets; archive signed artifacts.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: hosted-baseline-prod.json status=pass with backupRestore.ok=true (or rerun confirms existing pass artifact)

tickets.Summary: Generate and sign chargeback evidence packet
tickets.Description: Generate and sign chargeback + design-partner evidence packets from repeated automated runs without manual DB edits.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Artifacts committed/archived and linked from release checklist; reproducible across runs

tickets.Summary: Drain outbox backlog + triage SLA gauges
tickets.Description: Drain worker outbox to steady-state and root-cause SLA gauge alerts with issue links.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: worker_outbox_pending_total_gauge near zero; triage tickets created with owners and due dates

tickets.Description: Prototype MCP server exposing Settld tools (create agreement, submit evidence, settle, dispute) via stdio transport.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: MCP-compatible agent can discover + invoke Settld tools; spike doc with API surface and latency measurements committed

tickets.Description: Rough 5-minute tutorial for connecting an agent to the MCP spike server.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Draft doc committed; reviewed by 1 external tester

tickets.Description: Fully typed TypeScript SDK with auto-generated types from OpenAPI spec. Tree-shakeable, published to npm.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Types match 100% of OpenAPI spec; tree-shakeable; npm package published

tickets.Description: Async-first Python SDK with Pydantic models, context managers. Published to PyPI with 100% API coverage.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: PyPI package; 100% API coverage; async/sync modes; Pydantic models

tickets.Description: Idiomatic Go client with context propagation covering core flows (agreement → settle → dispute).
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Go module; covers core flows; context propagation correct

tickets.Description: Swagger UI + 'Try It' with sandbox auto-provisioning hosted at /docs/api.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Hosted at /docs/api; sandbox keys auto-created on first use

tickets.Description: OpenAPI codegen pipeline for JS/Python/Go/Rust that CI generates + publishes SDKs on spec change.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: CI generates + publishes SDKs on spec change; diff checks on breaking changes

tickets.Description: Docusaurus site with guides, API reference, examples. Deployed, SEO-optimized, search functional.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Deployed; SEO-optimized; search works; includes getting-started and migration guides

tickets.Description: settld CLI with init, dev, deploy, status, logs subcommands. Installable via npm/brew with shell completions.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: CLI installable via npm/brew; shell completions; all subcommands documented

tickets.Description: Harden MCP spike into production server with SSE + stdio transport, auth, rate limiting, and error handling.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: MCP-compatible agent discovers + invokes Settld tools in production; handles auth and errors gracefully

tickets.Description: HTTP→MCP bridge that proxies authenticated Settld API calls as tool responses with conformance vector passthrough.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Gateway passes conformance vectors; latency < 50ms overhead

tickets.Description: First-party adapters for OpenAI function calling, Anthropic tool use, and LangChain/LangGraph with runnable examples.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Each adapter has a runnable example + smoke test passing in CI

tickets.Description: Agents self-register via API key + capability advertisement. E2E flow from registration through settlement.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: E2E test: agent registers → creates agreement → completes settlement

tickets.Description: Polished 5-minute 'connect your agent to Settld' tutorial with video walkthrough artifact.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Doc + video walkthrough artifact published; tested by 3 external developers

tickets.Description: ZK-friendly proof envelopes that reveal only what the verifier needs while preserving hash integrity.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Proof verifies without exposing raw evidence content; tampered disclosures rejected

tickets.Description: Automatic detection + redaction of PII in evidence metadata, configurable per-tenant, deterministic and auditable.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Configurable per-tenant; redaction is deterministic + auditable; supports custom patterns

tickets.Description: Tenant-level region pinning for evidence + metadata storage with EU/US support and migration tooling.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: EU/US region support; migration tooling for existing data; audit trail for region changes

tickets.Description: Complete, immutable audit trail export covering all admin actions, auth events, and data access.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Export covers all admin actions, auth events, data access; schema-validated output

tickets.Description: Export, anonymize, delete endpoints per data subject with deterministic anonymization preserving ledger invariants.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Deterministic anonymization preserves ledger balance invariant; all endpoints functional

tickets.Description: Tenant-level compliance posture view with gaps/recommendations and exportable PDF scorecard.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Visual compliance scorecard; exportable PDF report; gaps < 5 for SOC 2 readiness

tickets.Description: PgBouncer integration, query plan analysis, N+1 elimination for p95 < 100ms at 10x load.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: p95 API latency < 100ms at 10x current load; zero N+1 queries in hot paths

tickets.Description: PostgreSQL RLS policies for all tenant-scoped tables with fuzz test validation.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Fuzz test: 10K random cross-tenant queries return zero leaks

tickets.Description: Sliding window, per-tenant, per-endpoint rate limits with Redis backing, configurable per plan tier.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Rate limits configurable per plan tier; 429s include retry-after header

tickets.Description: Replace autotick with proper job queue (BullMQ or similar) with restart survival, dead-letter queue, and admin visibility.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Jobs survive restarts; dead-letter queue operational; admin dashboard shows job status

tickets.Description: Deep health checks for DB, Redis, S3, job queue with degraded mode and component-level status.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: /health returns component-level status; alerts fire on degraded state

tickets.Description: Zero-downtime deploys with connection draining for rolling deployments.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Rolling deploy with 0 failed requests under load test

tickets.Description: Vault/KMS integration for signing keys + API keys with rotation without downtime.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: No plaintext secrets in env vars; rotation without downtime; audit trail for access

tickets.Description: JSON logs with correlation IDs, tenant context, and trace propagation across all services.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All log lines have traceId, tenantId, requestId; queryable in log aggregator

tickets.Description: Distributed tracing for API → workers → storage → external calls visible in Jaeger/Grafana Tempo.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Traces visible in Jaeger/Grafana Tempo; span coverage > 90%

tickets.Description: Business metrics (settlements/min, dispute rate, revenue) + infra metrics with auto-provisioned Grafana dashboards.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Grafana dashboards auto-provisioned via deploy/observability; all metrics queryable

tickets.Description: PagerDuty/Slack alerts for SLO breaches, ledger drift, reconciliation mismatches with runbooks.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Alert runbook for every alert; tested via chaos injection; zero alert fatigue

tickets.Description: Extend scripts/chaos.js with network partition, clock skew, DB failure scenarios running in CI.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Chaos suite runs in CI; no data corruption in any scenario

tickets.Description: Auto-create incident channels, page on-call, assemble evidence bundle. Integration with PagerDuty + Slack.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Integration with PagerDuty + Slack functional; drill runs every 2 weeks

tickets.Description: Modern React/Vite dashboard with dark mode, glassmorphism, real-time WebSocket updates. Built on stable ops data post-hardening.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Pixel-perfect implementation; dark mode; live transaction feed; WebSocket latency < 200ms

tickets.Description: Visual state machine progression with event drill-down in the dashboard.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Click any state → see events, evidence refs, ledger postings

tickets.Description: Real-time escrow exposure, settlement velocity, dispute rate, revenue charts with CSV/PDF export.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Charts update live; export to CSV/PDF functional

tickets.Description: Interactive D3/force-directed graph of buyer↔vendor↔contract trust edges with diff overlay.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Graph renders for 500+ nodes; diff overlay between months

tickets.Description: Searchable registry of agent capabilities with semantic matching and vector similarity.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Search returns relevant capabilities in < 200ms; vector similarity working

tickets.Description: Real-time price discovery based on supply/demand, reputation, SLA tier with documented model.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Pricing model documented; backtested against historical data

tickets.Description: Agreements with > 2 parties (requester, primary agent, sub-agents) with N-way ledger splits.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Ledger handles N-way splits; settlement balances for 3+ parties

tickets.Description: Automated matching of RFQs to capability listings with scoring and A/B test infrastructure.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Match quality tracked; A/B test infrastructure for scoring algorithms

tickets.Description: Supply/demand curves, liquidity metrics, take-rate optimization analytics.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Analytics exportable; drives pricing engine adjustments

tickets.Description: Agents can sub-contract tasks with full provenance tracking in proof bundles.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Full chain of custody visible in proof bundles

tickets.Description: Extend ledger for multi-currency postings with FX rate pinning and auditable rate sources.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All invariants hold across currencies; FX rate source auditable

tickets.Description: Managed accounts for instant payouts to agent owners with reconciliation matching.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Payout within 24h for verified settlements; reconciliation matches to zero

tickets.Description: KYC/AML checks, sanctions screening, tax withholding that block settlement until cleared.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Compliance checks block settlement until cleared; full audit trail

tickets.Description: Configurable payout windows (daily/weekly/monthly) with batching and auto-retry.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Batch efficiency > 95%; failed payouts auto-retry with alerts

tickets.Description: Automated 1099/W-8 generation and tax year summaries, deterministic and exportable.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Reports generated deterministically; exportable as PDF/CSV

tickets.Description: HTTP 402-based payment negotiation adapter for ecosystem reach. Optional—does not block core settlement rails.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Adapter works E2E in sandbox; documented as optional ecosystem extension

tickets.Description: Org → team → member model with inherited permissions enforced on every API call.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: RBAC enforced on every API call; inheritance correct across org levels

tickets.Description: SAML 2.0 + OIDC for enterprise identity providers (Okta, Azure AD, Google Workspace).
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Okta/Azure AD/Google Workspace tested and documented

tickets.Description: Multi-sig approval for high-value settlements and policy changes with configurable chains.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Approval chain configurable per org; audit trail complete

tickets.Description: 'What-if' mode for policy changes before rollout, running simulation against historical data.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Simulation runs against historical data; diff report generated

tickets.Description: Visual SLA template editor with constraint validation and sample data preview.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: UI generates valid SLA policy; preview against sample data

tickets.Description: Dedicated audit console with evidence search, timeline reconstruction for auditor role.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Auditor role can search any artifact by hash, date, party

tickets.Description: Active-passive PostgreSQL with automatic failover (RDS/AlloyDB), tested quarterly.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Failover < 30s; zero data loss; tested quarterly

tickets.Description: Cloudflare/Fastly for static assets, verification reports, public receipts with global TTFB < 50ms.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: TTFB < 50ms globally; cache hit rate > 90%

tickets.Description: Route read-heavy queries (inbox, analytics, trust graph) to replicas with < 1s lag.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Read latency improvement > 50%; replica lag < 1s

tickets.Description: Kafka/NATS for event fan-out (webhooks, analytics, billing) with at-least-once delivery.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Event delivery latency < 500ms; at-least-once guaranteed

tickets.Description: Automated DR drills with RPO/RTO validation, passing quarterly.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: DR drill passes quarterly; RPO < 1min, RTO < 15min

tickets.Description: Zero-downtime migration deployments with traffic splitting and automatic rollback on error spike.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Canary deploys with automatic rollback on error rate spike

tickets.Description: Contextual upgrade nudges when hitting plan limits at 80% and 100%.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Prompt at 80%/100% of limits; conversion tracked

tickets.Description: Automated referral tracking with credit + payout, fully automated from signup to credit.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Referral link → signup → credit applied; fully automated

tickets.Description: Real-time usage dashboard with cost projections updating within 5 minutes.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Usage updates within 5 minutes; projection accuracy > 90%

tickets.Description: Community-contributed SLA templates, policy packs, integration blueprints with submit → review → publish flow.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Submit → review → publish flow; version control

tickets.Description: <settld-verify> web component for embedding verification receipts in any app. < 50KB, themeable.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Widget < 50KB; works in React/Vue/vanilla; themeable

tickets.Description: Health scoring, churn prediction, automated re-engagement with per-tenant health scores.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Health score per tenant; automated alerts to CS team

tickets.Description: Settld status page with incident history, uptime metrics, automated by monitoring with RSS feed.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Automated by monitoring; RSS feed for updates

tickets.Description: Learnings from v1 → v2 spec with improved extensibility, versioning, and forward-compatibility. RFC published.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Spec reviewed by 3+ external engineers; RFC published

tickets.Description: Certification program for external verifiers to become 'Settld Certified' with test suite.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Certification test suite complete; first external verifier passes

tickets.Description: Plugin system for custom evidence types, verification rules, settlement logic. Stable API with examples.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Plugin API stable; 3 example plugins published

tickets.Description: Conformance suite runs in Rust, Go, Python, and Node with 100% vector pass rate.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All 4 language implementations pass 100% of conformance vectors

tickets.Description: Publish Settld protocol as open standard proposal to relevant standards body or as RFC.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Draft submitted to relevant standards body or published as RFC

tickets.Description: Public directory of Settld-integrated agents, tools, and services with programmatic listing API.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Directory live; API for programmatic listing

sprint_gates.Gate Command: npm run ops:hosted-baseline:evidence -- --base-url "$SETTLD_BASE_URL" --tenant-id "$SETTLD_TENANT_ID" --ops-token "$SETTLD_OPS_TOKEN" --environment prod --run-backup-restore true --require-backup-restore true --database-url "$DATABASE_URL" --restore-database-url "$RESTORE_DATABASE_URL" --out ./artifacts/ops/hosted-baseline-prod.json
npm run sdk:smoke && npm run sdk:smoke:py && npm run sdk:first-run
npm run chaos && npm run test:ops:throughput:incident
